name: Chess (itch) (IgorApplications)
description:
Chess is a board game with chess pieces on a 64-cell board that combines elements of art, science and sports. Chess is usually played by two players, but modern technology has allowed people to create artificial chess intelligence. Nowadays, chess is very popular and is played by most of the world.

Chess is an endless mind exercise that develops lifelong mental skills such as: concentration, critical thinking, abstract thinking, problem solving, pattern recognition, strategic planning, creativity, analysis, synthesis and evaluation. Such a game preserves the mental abilities of older players and helps prevent the development of disease symptoms. The game is essentially for two players, which in turn improves the emotional state.

IgorApplications has developed a new chess strategy that brings modern advantages to the classic game. Our application has a special design, it does not require an internet connection and is absolutely free.

In our strategy, you can gradually go through different levels of difficulty. The system determines your best result and the number of stars for the completed level. Also, for each victory, a reward in the form of coins is provided, which can be spent on interesting things. The game has various game modes, such as two player or AI game. In addition, the game has a wide range of settings, expanding the number of game types. You can choose a set of chess pieces according to your wishes or customize any function.

IgorApplications wishes you a good game.
